original: Nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkilesikaṁ
analyzed: na saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saṅkilesika

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na saṅkilesikam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasaṅkilesiko ca naasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca na saṅkilesiko ca na asaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Naasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nasaṅkilesikañca naasaṅkilesikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkilesikam ca na asaṅkilesikam ca dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro
